mapper.select: SELECT D.DELIVERY_NO , S.DELIVERY_STATUS_NO , S.DELIVERY_STATUS , D.ORDER_NO , M.ID , M.NAME , M.NICK , M.TEL , D.ADDRESS_NO , A.ADDRESS , TO_CHAR (D.DELIVERY_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DELIVERY_START_DATE , D.DELIVERY_FINISH_DATE FROM DELIVERY D JOIN DELIVERY_STATUS S ON S.DELIVERY_STATUS_NO = D.DELIVERY_STATUS_NO JOIN ORDERS O ON O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO JOIN ADDRESS A ON A.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY DELIVERY_NO DESC

SELECT D.DELIVERY_NO , S.DELIVERY_STATUS_NO , S.DELIVERY_STATUS , D.ORDER_NO , M.ID , M.NAME , M.NICK , M.TEL , D.ADDRESS_NO , a.ADDRESS , TO_CHAR (D.DELIVERY_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE , TO_CHAR (D.DELIVERY_FINISH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FINISH_DATE FROM DELIVERY D JOIN DELIVERY_STATUS S ON S.DELIVERY_STATUS_NO = D.DELIVERY_STATUS_NO JOIN ORDERS O ON O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO JOIN ADDRESS A ON A.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE D.DELIVERY_NO = #{deliveryNo}
